effect: [ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Bind one or more cards from soul], and this unit gets "[CONT](VC):This unit gets the card names of all of your face up grade 1 or greater cards with "Stealth" in their card names in your bind zone." until end of turn.[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Put two rear-guards into soul], search your deck for up to two cards with the same card name as this unit, call them to (RC), and they get [Power] +5000 until end of turn. Shuffle the deck.[CONT](VC):If your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, all of your rear-guards with "Stealth" in their same card name as this unit can attack from the back row.

name: Wrought Iron General Dragon, Fierce Galer Dragon
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, if this unit was chosen by the ability of the Smithy in your order zone this turn, until end of that battle, this unit gets [Power] +5000, [COST][Soul-Blast 2], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and retire it.

name: Wrought Iron Dragon King, Zedhlans
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed by riding from a unit with "Zedhlans" in its card name, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], search your deck or drop for up to one set order, reveal it and put it into hand, and if you searched the deck, shuffle the deck.[AUTO](VC)[1/turn]:When this unit attacks, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and this unit gets drive +1 until end of turn. If your unit was chosen by the ability of the Smithy in your order zone three or more times this turn, at the end of that battle, [Stand] this unit, and it gets [Power] +10000/drive -3 until end of turn.

name: Dragritter, Halbe
effect: [CONT]:When this card would be discarded from hand for the cost of the ability of your vanguard with "Overlord" in its card name, it may be regarded as discarding two cards.[AUTO]:When this card is discarded from hand for the cost of the ability of your vanguard with "Overlord" in its card name, you may call this card to a back row (RC). If you called, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.

name: Blaze Maiden, Shahdia
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from hand, if you have two or more normal units with "Blaze Maiden" in their card names, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], search your deck for up to one "Trickstar" or "Trickmoon", discard it, and shuffle the deck.

name: Demonic Lord of Hades Blaze, Baphormedes
effect: [AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, [COST][put two grade 3 rear-guards into soul], draw a card, and this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of that battle for every three grade 3 cards in your soul.[CONT](VC):This unit gets all of the following according to the number of grade 3 cards in your soul.・Three or more - All of your grade 3 units get [Shield] +5000, and "Boost".・Six or more - When your opponent would call cards from hand to (GC) for the battle this unit attacked, they must call three or more at the same time.

name: Flower of Ruined Castle, Empousa
effect: [AUTO]Front Row (RC):When you [Soul-Blast 4] or more at the same time for the cost of your vanguard's ability, if your unit did not [Stand] by a card's ability this turn, you may [Stand] this unit. If you [Stand] this unit, at the end of that turn, [COST][retire this unit], choose a grade 2 or greater unit card from your soul, and put it into hand.

name: Quaking Ripple Monster, Eledglema
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (VC), reveal the top five cards of your deck, put all set orders from among them into the order zone, and shuffle the deck. [AUTO](VC):At the end of the battle this unit attacked, choose any number of set orders from your order zone, if you chose three or more cards with different card names, choose one of your rear-guards and [Stand] it, and if you chose five or more cards with different card names, [Stand] this unit, and this unit gets [Power] +10000/drive -2 until end of turn. Return all of the cards chosen from the order zone by this ability to the deck and shuffle it.

name: Ala Dargente
effect: [AUTO](RC):When your vanguard with "Avantgarda" in its card name attacks, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.[AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if you put a strategy card from order zone into soul this turn, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], search your deck or drop for up to one strategy card with a different card name as the card put from order zone into soul this turn, reveal it and put it into hand, and if you searched the deck, shuffle the deck.

name: Soul Awakening Guard, Leuhan
effect: [ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Soul-Blast 1], search your deck for up to one grade 2 card with "Marris" in its card name, call it to (RC), and shuffle the deck.[AUTO](VC):At the end of the battle this unit attacked, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & put a grade 2 rear-guard with "Marris" in its card name into soul], search your deck or hand for up to one grade 3 or greater card with "Leuhanmaris" in its card name, ride it as [Stand], and until end of turn, put the cards revealed for the drive check of the battle that unit attacked on the bottom of the deck instead of the hand. If you searched the deck, shuffle the deck.

name: Soul Awakening Dragon Horse, Leuhanmaris
effect: [CONT](VC):During your turn, if your soul has "Soul Awakening Guard, Leuhan", this unit gets [Power] +10000.[AUTO](VC):At the end of your turn, choose a "Soul Awakening Guard, Leuhan" from your soul, and ride it as [Rest].

name: Knight of Soaring Blade, Ffernbael
effect: [AUTO]Back Row Center (RC):At the end of the battle this unit attacked, if your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, [COST][Soul-Blast 1 & discard a card from hand], choose one of your vanguards with "Gramgrace" in its card name, and it gets [Power] +10000/drive +1 until end of turn.

name: Knight of Inheritance, Emmeline
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from hand, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], look at the top five cards of your deck, choose up to one unit card with "Blaster" in its card name from among them, call it to (RC), or reveal it and put it into hand, and shuffle the deck. If you put a card into hand, choose a card from your hand, and discard it.[AUTO](RC):When your unit with "Blaster" in its card name attacks, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.

name: Empyrean Blue Dragon, Shelling Cannon Dragon
effect: [AUTO]Back Row Center (RC):At the beginning of your battle phase, if your vanguard is "Flagship Dragon, Flagburg Dragon", and your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and until end of turn, this unit can attack from the back row, and gets [Power] +10000.[CONT]Back Row Center (RC):If you would move or swap this unit during your main phase, you can also move it within the same row.

effect: [ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Discard a card from hand], choose up to one "Trickstar" and up to one <Prayer Dragon>  from your drop, and call them to (RC).[AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose one of your rear-guards in the XoverDress state, and [Stand] it.

name: Trickstar
effect: [CONT](RC):This unit cannot be chosen by your opponent's card effects.
